function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possibility of vertical transmission of SARS-CoV-2 from mother to child","Impact":"Risk of neonatal infection and potential health complications","Mitigation":"Delivering neonates in negative pressure isolation rooms, implementing protective measures for parents and healthcare staff, and promoting appropriate hygiene measures","Technologies":"Negative pressure isolation rooms, protective suits, masks","People":"Neonates, pregnant women, healthcare professionals, family members","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, hospital management"},{"Description":"Limitations of included studies from specific geographic areas","Impact":"Limited generalizability of findings to other demographic areas","Mitigation":"Inclusion of data from majorly affected demographic areas, diverse population samples, and larger study cohorts","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools for diverse population samples","People":"Research team, healthcare professionals, public health authorities","Owner":"Research team, healthcare professionals"}]}
